snippet.title: Candy's Custom Night - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
We do not own any assets used in the trailer/mod or the characters. All aspects of these belong to the respected owners.

Five Nights at Candy's & It's characters belong to Emil Macko

What is Candy's Custom Night?
It is a UCN mod that is based off of Five Nights at Candy's 1 - 3. Mod was built using Clickteam.

Will there be a mobile port?
As of now, no.

Mod page: https://gamejolt.com/games/CandyCN/877743

Please go play the original games that started this mod:
https://gamejolt.com/playlist/five-nights-at-candy-s/293416
https://store.steampowered.com/app/871720/Ultimate_Custom_Night/

Huge thanks to @JacksonMerril16 for his help on making the trailer!!!
